children.description: Node passed into the SVG element.
children.description_zh: 节点传递到 SVG 元素中。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

color.description: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide. You can use the htmlColor prop to apply a color attribute to the SVG element.
color.description_zh: 组件的颜色。它支持默认和自定义主题颜色，可以按照调色板自定义指南中所示进行添加。您可以使用 htmlColor 属性将 color 属性应用于 SVG 元素。
color.type: inherit| action| disabled| primary| secondary| error| info| success| warning| string

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

fontSize.description: The fontSize applied to the icon. Defaults to 24px, but can be configure to inherit font size.
fontSize.description_zh: 应用于图标的 fontSize。默认为 24px，但可以配置为继承字体大小。

htmlColor.description: Applies a color attribute to the SVG element.
htmlColor.description_zh: 将颜色属性应用于 SVG 元素。

inheritViewBox.description: If true, the root node will inherit the custom component's viewBox and the viewBox prop will be ignored. Useful when you want to reference a custom component and have SvgIcon pass that component's viewBox to the root node.
inheritViewBox.description_zh: 如果为 true，则根节点将继承自定义组件的 viewBox，并且将忽略 viewBox 属性。当您想要引用自定义组件并让 SvgIcon 将该组件的 viewBox 传递到根节点时，这很有用。

shapeRendering.description: The shape-rendering attribute. The behavior of the different options is described on the MDN Web Docs. If you are having issues with blurry icons you should investigate this prop.
shapeRendering.description_zh: shape-rendering 属性。MDN Web 文档中描述了不同选项的行为。如果您遇到模糊图标的问题，您应该调查此道具。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

titleAccess.description: Provides a human-readable title for the element that contains it. https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG-access/#Equivalent
titleAccess.description_zh: 为包含该标题的元素提供人类可读的标题。https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG-access/#Equivalent

viewBox.description: Allows you to redefine what the coordinates without units mean inside an SVG element. For example, if the SVG element is 500 (width) by 200 (height), and you pass viewBox="0 0 50 20", this means that the coordinates inside the SVG will go from the top left corner (0,0) to bottom right (50,20) and each unit will be worth 10px.
viewBox.description_zh: 允许您重新定义 SVG 元素中不带单位的坐标的含义。例如，如果 SVG 元素是 500（宽）x 200（高），并且您传递 viewBox=“0 0 50 20”，这意味着 SVG 内部的坐标将从左上角 （0,0） 到右下角 （50,20），每个单位的值为 10px。
